content: *cyanne is a coverlet made up of multi-colored starflowers crocheted in comfort dk berroco * materials berroco comfort dk 50 grs 6 balls #2730 teaberry 7 balls #2723 rosebud 7 balls #2745 filbert 5 balls #2721 sprig and 7 balls #2744 teal crochet hook size 4 00 mm f schematic is provided to show flower placement flowers are worked in 3 rounds joining with next flower on the last round our throw was 27 flowers across x 28 flowers long
